name: FB Orange Bubbles
additional_info:
18/9/12. Timeline fixes, unprefixed top bar gradient, and other changes.
17/9/12. Unprefixed transitions. Timeline changes coming "soon".
18/8/11. Fixes for new homepage sidebar.
21/3/11. CSS transition on Hover backgrounds if using Firefox 4 or Chrome.
17/3/11. Remove hover background from "Find Friends". Not necessary with a light colored theme.
4/3/11. A few noticeable changes that make this theme look better.
26/2/11. Hover background on statuses. Consistency when hovering logout link and the other links in the "Account" menu.
23/2/11. Fixed Like button issues.
